Name: stash-invest-build-wealth
Title: Very solid app
Review:
one thing that i appreciate about this app is how user friendly it is. i'm super new to investing and this app simplifies most everything so it's easy to just jump into it.
however there are a couple of things that i think stash could/should add to make it absolutely must use.
1) portfolio dividend tracker. for those looking to build a dividend portfolio this feels like an auto-include. as one updates their portfolio the ability to see exactly how much in dividends they stand to receive would make it easier to decide how much to buy from a stock. and while i like that each stock conveys info on its previous dividend payment, it doesn't include info on its next expected payment, which i find to be annoying.
2) update stash card: unfortunately i find the stash debit card features to be kind of not worth getting it. i made a $12 purchase with the card and got a penny of stock buybacks. not at all worth it.
3) fail safe needs updating: occasionally i'll get a buy fail message on the basis of insufficient funds when i know that is untrue as i constantly check my available funds.

while i feel like these features would make the system all the more user friendly, as it is i'm still very satisfied with how my investing journey has gone with stash thus far
